thread.title: BRIEF-Wayfair Says On April 12, Co, Unit Entered Into Amendment No. 2 To Credit Agreement Dated As Of February 22, 2017

title: BRIEF-Wayfair Says On April 12, Co, Unit Entered Into Amendment No. 2 To Credit Agreement Dated As Of February 22, 2017

organizations.name: credit agreement dated as of february

text:
Market News April 13, 2018 / 8:21 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Wayfair Says On April 12, Co, Unit Entered Into Amendment No. 2 To Credit Agreement Dated As Of February 22, 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  Wayfair Inc: 
* WAYFAIR INC SAYS ON APRIL 12, CO, UNIT ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT NO. 2 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 22, 2017 - SEC FILING 
* WAYFAIR INC SAYS AMENDMENT NO. 2 INCREASES LETTER OF CREDIT SUBLIMIT TO $65 MLN - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2qu96sT ] Further company coverage:
